entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:10 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 8:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: -1.8°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Blizzard developing this evening. Local snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:52 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:52 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 early in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:52 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
